plot: Three men in love with the same woman contend with each other and with her father, until one of them takes her on an airplane in an attempt to elope with her.
title: When Love Took Wings

plot_en: Three men in love with the same woman contend with each other and with her father, until one of them takes her on an airplane in an attempt to elope with her.

cast.role: Fatty's Rival - the Girl's True Love
cast.name: Joe Bordeaux
